title: 插件连接mysql数据库
author: 三念
txt_content:
[11:48:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [XConomy] Enabling XConomy v1.9
[11:48:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [XConomy] 数据保存方式 - MySQL
[11:48:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [XConomy] 无法连接到数据库-----
[11:48:33] [Server thread/INFO]: [XConomy] Unable to load authentication plugin 'caching_sha2_password'.
[11:48:33] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling XConomy v1.9 (Is it up to date?)
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at me.Yi.XConomy.Data.MySQL1.zx(MySQL1.java:57) ~[?:?]
        at me.Yi.XConomy.Data.MySQL1.checkcr(MySQL1.java:70) ~[?:?]
        at me.Yi.XConomy.XConomy.onEnable(XConomy.java:81) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:264) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:316) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:405) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftServer.enablePlugin(CraftServer.java:395) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:344) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:223) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:616) ~[Paper.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]

replies.author: 伊C
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 伊C 于 2020-4-3 14:45 编辑 

XConomy 暂时不支持 MySQL 8 的 caching_sha2_password 加密方式

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
密码没错吗
更新下XConomy插件呢

replies.author: 三念
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-4-1 12:03
密码没错吗
更新下XConomy插件呢
插件是最新版，密码没错，我换过账户名和密码试好多次了

replies.author: 贺兰兰
replies.txt_content:
Unable to load authentication plugin 'caching_sha2_password'.
检查插件外置库是否正常下载完成
